remarks: Value of the first projection functor.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
1stfval.t $e |- T = ( C Xc. D ) $.
1stfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` T ) $.
1stfval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` T ) $.
1stfval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
1stfval.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
1stfval.p $e |- P = ( C 1stF D ) $.
1stfval $p |- ( ph -> P = <. ( 1st |` B ) , ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( 1st |` ( x H y ) ) ) >. ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d ph x y $.
